channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ SENATOR CYNTHIA LUMMIS CONTINUES PUSH FOR 21ST CENTURY MORTGAGE ACT ☠⚡
item.description:
**Title: Senator Lummis Is Raging Against the Housing Machines with the 21st Century Mortgage Act! 🤘⚡️**
Listen up, metalheads and crypto crusaders! Your girl Cynthia Lummis is back in the arena, swinging her axe and slamming down the walls that have kept first-time homebuyers shackled in a mosh pit of financial despair! 🎸🔥
In a wild post on X (yeah, you know the noise), the Senator from the land of cowboys and crypto warriors, Wyoming, is all fired up about her 21st Century Mortgage Act! She's not just whispering sweet nothings—she’s blasting a full-on metal anthem against housing costs that make you wanna scream into the void.
She dropped a gnarly clip on August 24, laying down the brutal truth: buying a home shouldn’t feel like a Death Metal marathon where only the elite survive! 🤘🏠 It’s time to rip down those barriers and let first-time buyers dive into the real estate mosh pit like the rockstars they are!
So grab your axes, your cryptos, and your dreams! Senator Lummis is ready to shred the status quo and bring the house down—literally! 🏡💰
Catch the dissonance of her fight and amplify the noise right here: [Senator Cynthia Lummis Keeps Cranking Up the 21st Century Mortgage Act!](https://cryptonews.com/news/senator-cynthia-lummis-continues-push-for-21st-century-mortgage-act/) Let’s make the dream of homeownership rip through this capitalist chaos like a double bass drum through an amp! \m/
